run_transitions.py¶

Main module of cross_sections

  • you input some variables, like paths to files

  • then for each bound state of the resultant nucleus, we make a directory with - transitions_NCSMC.in - wavefunction_NCSMC file - link to executable transitions code - norm_sqrt file - form_factors file - scattering_wf_NCSMC file

cross_sections.run_transitions.make_dir(res_state)¶

Makes a directory for the given state of the resultant nucleus.

res_state:

string, of the form “1 -1 3”

cross_sections.run_transitions.run_exe(exe)¶

Runs an executable file, writes output to output.txt in the same directory as the executable.

exe:

the path to an executable file
